topic.title: What do you think about the smallpox thingy?
topic.body: Bill Gates warned people of terrorism attacks using smallpox and 2 weeks later the FBI found vials in Philadelphia with smallpox written on it. Clearly something is wrong. What do you think they are planning?

1632001629_178KvFeW5b16fZsNtWY3pDjLHj8ai.body:
Same

I really fucking hate niggers
